note.p: Scottish journalist and editor. Reporter for the Dumfries Courier from 1855; subeditor and reporter, 1861; editor and proprietor of the Dumfries and Galloway Courier, 1870–1. Member of the Dumfriesshire and Galloway Natural History and Antiquarian Society.
Census returns of Scotland 1861 (The National Archives of Scotland: Dumfries St Michael 16/8), 1871 (Dumfries 16/31)
James Smith, History of Lodge St. Michael’s Kilwinning, No. 63 Dumfries (Dumfries: J. Maxwell & Son, 1895), pp. 80–1.
Transactions and Journal of the Proceedings of the Dumfriesshire & Galloway Natural History and Antiquarian Society (1862–3): 16.
